mapper.select: SELECT CARACC_NO, CAR_BOARD_NO, CARACC_PROCESS, CARACC_XPOINT, CARACC_YPOINT, CARACC_COMENT, CARACC_NICKNAME, CARACC_ACC FROM CARPOOL_ACC ORDER BY CARACC_NO DESC

SELECT CARACC_NO, CAR_BOARD_NO, CARACC_PROCESS, CARACC_XPOINT, CARACC_YPOINT, CARACC_COMENT, CARACC_NICKNAME, CARACC_ACC FROM CARPOOL_ACC WHERE CAR_BOARD_NO IN (SELECT CAR_BOARD_NO FROM CARPOOL_BOARD WHERE CAR_BOARD_WRITER = #{writer}) ORDER BY CARACC_NO DESC
SELECT CARACC_NO, CAR_BOARD_NO, CARACC_PROCESS, CARACC_XPOINT, CARACC_YPOINT, CARACC_COMENT, CARACC_NICKNAME, CARACC_ACC FROM CARPOOL_ACC WHERE CARACC_NICKNAME = #{writer} ORDER BY CARACC_NO DESC
